revision.comment: Central Nahuatl: correct misformatted language section divider at end; Central Nahuatl: correct whitespace of section 0
revision.text: ==Central Nahuatl== ===Alternative forms=== * {{sense|Cholula}} {{l|nhn|catzotl}} ===Noun=== {{head|nhn|noun}} # [[jicama]]. [[Category:Amecameca Central Nahuatl]] {{c|nhn|Plants}} ---- ==Classical Nahuatl== ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|nci|xicama}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|nci|/ʃiːkamatɬ/}} ===Noun=== {{head|nci|noun|head=xīcamatl}} # [[jicama]] #* '''1571''', [[w:Alonso de Molina|Alonso de Molina]], ''[[w:Vocabulario en lengua castellana y mexicana y mexicana y castellana|Vocabulario en lengua castellana y mexicana y mexicana y castellana]]'', f. 159r. col. 1. #*: '''xicamatl'''. cierta rayz que se come cruda y es muy dulce. #*: ('''xicamatl'''. a certain root that is eaten raw and is very sweet.) ====Descendants==== * {{desc|es|jícama}} ===References=== * “[https://web.archive.org/web/20161203034759/http://whp.uoregon.edu/dictionaries/nahuatl/index.lasso xicamatl]” in the ''Nahuatl Dictionary'', University of Oregon, 2011.
